```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)

F = rprojroot::is_rstudio_project$make_fix_file()
df <- read_excel(F("data/current/March2022Sheet.xlsx"))



df <- df[-c(1,2,27,28,29),][-c(3,12,13,14,17)][c(1:60),]

# Takes first 15 columns
df1 <- df[,1:10]
colnames(df1) <- c("wind", "wig", "wet_dry", "heatloss", "skin_temp", "resistance", "clo", "Mean Tsk (sel zones)", "amb_temp", "amb_rh")
df1$radiation='on'

# Takes rest of columns
df2 <- df[,11:20]
colnames(df2) <- c("wind", "wig", "wet_dry", "heatloss", "skin_temp", "resistance", "clo", "Mean Tsk (sel zones)", "amb_temp", "amb_rh")
df2$radiation='off'


df3 <- bind_rows(df1, df2)

df3 <- df3 %>%
  group_by(wind, wig, wet_dry, radiation) %>%
  mutate(trial = row_number()) %>%
  ungroup()

write.csv(df3,"data/current/reworkedUsable2.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```
